posts.post_content: wow wizards can go to hell. just because people can't beat caw blade they ban a card. if you keep loosing to caw blade then you suck... i got my mystics when they first came out for some fun with a kor deck. when i got more serious i ran naya with vengevines. after alara rotated out i added the full see set of mystics and swords to the deck list. It beat up on caw blade... honestly rotation was just a few months away. wizards go to helllllllllllllllllllllllll..... there were some decks that beat up on caw blade.... boros, the new RDW, a lot of decks with black ruined UW because of the hand control and vengevine decks did work... anyone ever think that its win % was so high because so many people at major tourney's play the deck?
